overview: Studio 2000 and acclaimed Euro-helmer Danny Ray take megahung Studio 2000 Exclusive Jake Havoc on an erotic bicycling tour of the Czech countryside in JAKE'S HARD RIDE! Grab your helmet and kneepads for three pulsing hours of sex, sex and more sex with 18 gorgeous, athletic, horned-up Czech studs (plus one American, natch!)
title: Jake's Hard Ride
